data.comment: The match has started at Estadio do Maracana.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Fluminense close to the penalty box.
Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in the half of Fluminense.
In the minute 3, Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Fluminense to take a throw-in in Goianiense GO territory.
Fluminense needs to be cautious. Goianiense GO have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 6, Goal kick for Goianiense GO at Estadio do Maracana.
Marielson Alves Silva signals a Fluminense throw-in in Goianiense GO's half.
Fluminense have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 7, Can Fluminense capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Goianiense GO's half?
Evanilson scores to make it 1-0 at Estadio do Maracana.
That's a fine assist from Nene.
In the minute 9, Marielson Alves Silva signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Marielson Alves Silva awards Goianiense GO a goal kick.
Marielson Alves Silva signals a free kick to Goianiense GO.
In the minute 11, Ball goes out of play for a Fluminense goal kick.
Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Goianiense GO in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 13, Renato Kayzer (Goianiense GO) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
In Rio de Janeiro, Marcos Paulo of Fluminense is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 14, Fluminense have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
Marielson Alves Silva signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 16, Fluminense drives forward and Michel Araujo gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Fluminense goal kick.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in the half of Fluminense.
In the minute 20, Marielson Alves Silva signals a throw-in for Goianiense GO, close to Fluminense's area.
Goianiense GO awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Fluminense's Michel Araujo breaks free at Estadio do Maracana. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 22, Marielson Alves Silva awards Goianiense GO a goal kick.
Can Fluminense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goianiense GO's half?
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Goianiense GO in their own half.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Fluminense have a goal kick.
In the minute 27, Michel Araujo (Fluminense) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Fluminense.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 30, Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
At Estadio do Maracana, Hudson has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Free kick Fluminense.
In the minute 31, Goianiense GO's Chico has been booked in Rio de Janeiro.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Dodi is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 34, Ball safe as Fluminense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Marielson Alves Silva signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 36, Goianiense GO are coming forward and Chico gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in the half of Fluminense.
In the minute 38, Goianiense GO to take a throw-in in Fluminense territory.
Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Marielson Alves Silva.
Marielson Alves Silva awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 40, Free kick Goianiense GO.
Dodi has recovered and rejoins the match in Rio de Janeiro.
Hudson in Fluminense has been yellow-carded a second time by Marielson Alves Silva and is being sent off.
In the minute 42, Goianiense GO pushes forward through Renato Kayzer, whose finish on goal is saved.
Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Marielson Alves Silva.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 44, Marielson Alves Silva signals a free kick to Goianiense GO.
Nino (Fluminense) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
In the minute 45, Goianiense GO are pushing forward but Nicolas Vichiatto's finish is wide of the goal.
Fluminense have a goal kick.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 45, Can Fluminense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goianiense GO's half?
Free kick for Fluminense in the half of Goianiense GO.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Estadio do Maracana.
Odair Hellmann is making the team's first substitution at Estadio do Maracana with Yago Felipe replacing Marcos Paulo.
Vagner Mancini (Goianiense GO) is making a first substitution, with Matheus Frizzo replacing Willian Maranhao.
In the minute 47, Throw-in Fluminense.
Marielson Alves Silva signals a Fluminense throw-in in Goianiense GO's half.
Marielson Alves Silva awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 48, Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Marielson Alves Silva.
Goianiense GO drive forward but Renato Kayzer is judged offside.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in the half of Fluminense.
In the minute 51, Important block from the Fluminense defence as Gustavo Ferrareis fires in a strike for Goianiense GO.
Goal kick for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
In Rio de Janeiro Goianiense GO drive forward through Chico. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 53, Ball safe as Fluminense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Fluminense.
Fluminense push forward at Estadio do Maracana and Evanilson gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Goianiense GO defence.
In the minute 55, Corner awarded to Fluminense.
Fluminense surge into the attack at Estadio do Maracana but Digaoâ€™s header is off-target.
Marielson Alves Silva awards Goianiense GO a goal kick.
In the minute 56, Edson for Goianiense GO gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Fluminense goal kick.
Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Marielson Alves Silva.
In the minute 60, Renato Kayzer of Goianiense GO gets in a strike, but is off target.
Fluminense have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO at Estadio do Maracana.
Marielson Alves Silva signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Everton Felipe is on a sub for Janderson Santos de Souza for Goianiense GO.
In the minute 60, The away team have replaced Gustavo Ferrareis with Matheuzinho. This is the third substitution made today by Vagner Mancini.
In the minute 61, Fluminense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Marielson Alves Silva signals a throw-in for Goianiense GO, close to Fluminense's area.
In the minute 62, It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
Dudu of Goianiense GO smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Marcos Felipe is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 66, The home team replace Nene with Luiz Henrique.
Fluminense's Marcos Felipe looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Marielson Alves Silva awards Fluminense a goal kick.
In the minute 69, In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Evanilson (Fluminense) has been given a yellow card and will be suspended from the next match.
Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
In the minute 70, Goianiense GO's Dudu misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Fluminense goal kick.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 71, Marielson Alves Silva signals a Goianiense GO throw-in in Fluminense's half.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Throw-in Goianiense GO.
In the minute 74, Fluminense needs to be cautious. Goianiense GO have an attacking throw-in.
Goal kick for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 75, Marielson Alves Silva signals a free kick to Goianiense GO.
Goianiense GO make their fourth substitution with Hyuri replacing Nicolas Vichiatto.
Goianiense GO to take a throw-in in Fluminense territory.
Goal! Renato Kayzer (Goianiense GO) levels the score at 1-1 with a header in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 79, Chico instrumental with a fine assist.
Nino for Fluminense drives towards goal at Estadio do Maracana. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
Fluminense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 82, Fernando Pacheco is replacing Evanilson for the home team.
In the minute 83, Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Marielson Alves Silva signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 84, Free kick Fluminense.
Free kick for Fluminense in the half of Goianiense GO.
Fred is replacing Michel Araujo for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
Digao's header is off-target for Fluminense.
In the minute 85, Goianiense GO have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
Can Goianiense GO get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fluminense's half?
In the minute 88, Dodi gets his shot on target but fails to score for Fluminense.
Ball safe as Goianiense GO is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goianiense GO drive upfield and Renato Kayzer gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Fluminense defender.
In the minute 89, Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Marielson Alves Silva.
Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goianiense GO's Matheuzinho gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Fluminense defender.
Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in the half of Fluminense.
Fluminense's Fred attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
Marielson Alves Silva will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
In Rio de Janeiro, Matheuzinho of Goianiense GO is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Can Fluminense capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Goianiense GO's half?
Marielson Alves Silva awards Goianiense GO a goal kick.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-1.
